typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	fileSystem: 'bronze',
	folderPath: 'CloudSales',
	fileName: 'dbo_Addresses.parquet',
	compressionCodec: 'snappy') ~> CloudSalesAddresses
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	fileSystem: 'bronze',
	folderPath: 'CloudStreaming',
	fileName: 'dbo_Addresses.parquet',
	compressionCodec: 'snappy') ~> CloudStreamingAddresses
CloudSalesAddresses, CloudStreamingAddresses join(CloudSalesAddresses@CustomerID == CloudStreamingAddresses@CustomerID
	&& CloudSalesAddresses@AddressID == CloudStreamingAddresses@AddressID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCustomers
JoinCustomers derive(NewAddressLine1 = iif(isNull(CloudSalesAddresses@AddressID), CloudStreamingAddresses@AddressLine1, CloudSalesAddresses@AddressLine1),
		NewAddressLine2 = iif(isNull(CloudSalesAddresses@AddressID), CloudStreamingAddresses@AddressLine2, CloudSalesAddresses@AddressLine2),
		NewCity = iif(isNull(CloudSalesAddresses@AddressID), CloudStreamingAddresses@City, CloudSalesAddresses@City),
		NewState = iif(isNull(CloudSalesAddresses@AddressID), CloudStreamingAddresses@State, CloudSalesAddresses@State),
		NewZipCode = iif(isNull(CloudSalesAddresses@AddressID), CloudStreamingAddresses@ZipCode, CloudSalesAddresses@ZipCode),
		NewCreatedDate = iif(isNull(CloudSalesAddresses@AddressID), CloudStreamingAddresses@CreatedDate, CloudSalesAddresses@CreatedDate),
		NewUpdatedDate = iif(isNull(CloudSalesAddresses@AddressID), CloudStreamingAddresses@UpdatedDate, CloudSalesAddresses@UpdatedDate),
		NewCustomerId = iif(isNull(CloudSalesAddresses@CustomerID), CloudStreamingAddresses@CustomerID, CloudSalesAddresses@CustomerID),
		NewAddressId = iif(isNull(CloudSalesAddresses@AddressID), CloudStreamingAddresses@AddressID, CloudSalesAddresses@AddressID),
		DataSourceId = 1) ~> CreateNewColumns
SelectColumns keyGenerate(output(AddressSK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AddSurrogateKey
CreateNewColumns select(mapColumn(
		AddressLine1 = NewAddressLine1,
		AddressLine2 = NewAddressLine2,
		City = NewCity,
		State = NewState,
		ZipCode = NewZipCode,
		CreatedDate = NewCreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = NewUpdatedDate,
		CustomerId = NewCustomerId,
		AddressId = NewAddressId,
		DataSourceId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
AddSurrogateKey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: 'silver',
	folderPath: 'Addresses',
	truncate:true,
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		AddressSK,
		AddressID = AddressId,
		CustomerID = CustomerId,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		DataSourceId
	)) ~> CustomerAddresses
